kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants path_url=/api/v1/restaurants headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '27', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "TestHotel_cFwEK"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:5000/api/v1/restaurants status=201, reason=CREATED headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.11.9', 'Date': 'Tue, 17 Feb 2026 05:22:14 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '121', 'Connection': 'close'} body={ "category": null, "contact": null, "enabled": true, "id": 2, "location": null, "name": "TestHotel_cFwEK" }
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
